column1: Dismissed with prejudice. @SeanParnellUSA lost...again.  "Truth hurts needed something more exciting." #PA17 https://t.co/XhokL6FXTC

MERCY!!! CONGRATS to the Pennsylvania 5A Champions @PRRamsFootball. You guys put on a show tonight. Just dominant against a very good team & strong defense. Enjoy the win you worked so hard for. #PA17 https://t.co/3o2ONnhq81
Here we go @PRRamsFootball! #PA17
CONGARATS to the Pennsylvania 3A CHAMPIONS  @CentralValleySD!!! Undefeated. A program that embodies excellence. So proud of you guys. #PA17 https://t.co/kUFXcCQTkH

As we give thanks today we can't forget the 2000+ Americans we lost just yesterday or those we've lost all year. But we can give thanks for the care they received for those who were saved & for those who do the caring & saving.   Happy Thanksgiving.
1) It was constitutional before you lost and remains constitutional after you lost.  There is no number 2. https://t.co/5EJ0sXmGs1

.@SenMastriano just want you to know that @SeanParnellUSA may say he likes you on Twitter but he's currently suing your General Assembly over the elections law you voted FOR.  Best part is he too was FOR the same law — until he lost.  These are facts. #PA17 #PASenate https://t.co/amEQE96BaY

Example of how the pandemic will cost jobs in western PA. Our workers counted on 2nd cracker. We need to do infrastructure while private projects are stuck. Protect jobs while protecting water transpo & energy systems. Bipartisan stimulus. No time to lose https://t.co/BU16jyZWWB

We saw it coming this summer. @RepBobGibbs & I worked across the aisle to increase federal support for state DOTs. We need what the Marines call "brilliance in the basics": fix the roads & keep people working.   Leadership on both sides please take note. https://t.co/GoQJePKYaE
10-0. #HereWeGo

Really tough loss for Beaver Falls last night in the PA 2A State Semifinals. But you guys showed incredible heart as you have all season & you continue to make us all proud. Can't wait to see you play in person next year. #PA17
Congratulations to @CentralValleySD for another dominant win last night in the 3A PA State Semifinals. You guys are incredible. Can't wait to see you bring it home next weekend! #PA17
WHAT A GAME! @PRRamsFootball with a huge comeback to beat Governor Mifflin & advance to the 5A PA State Championship. Congratulations & good luck next week. Will be watching & rooting for you! #PA17

Happy Birthday to two important people: @JoeBiden & my mom. The President-elect & the person who spent the past two years praying for him.  She actually broke her Rosary beads praying during my first campaign. So as the President-elect would say "not a joke folks."

SCOOP: Sources say Dem Baseball Manager @USRepMikeDoyle reevaluating his future with the organization after star pitcher/only real athlete on either team finds new friends.  Doyle wants to negotiate new clause to let @RepRichmond play. Richmond's interest unknown at this time. https://t.co/8TARjVWZrA
9-0. #HereWeGo

Congratulations to WPIAL 5A Champions Pine Richland @PRRamsFootball! Dominant win dominant season. Rooting for you guys in State playoffs.  Big night for #PA17 all around. Winners in 2A 3A 5A (plus my alma mater in 6A).

Big #PA17 battle tonight for the WPIAL 2A championship. Beaver Falls with the win & Sto-Rox as always showing incredible heart until the end. Congratulations to both teams for great seasons in tough circumstances. Good luck to Beaver Falls in the State playoffs. Rooting for you.
Wishing a #HappyDiwali to all those celebrating in #PA17 and around the world. May we all be filled with light in the months and years ahead.

The Pittsburgh Steelers are big fans of the Central Catholic Vikings.  Disappointed we can't watch Central today but this is very cool from @CoachTomlin. Congrats to Coach Totten & the team on a great season & another WPIAL Championship. https://t.co/rvbPH8NIwA
Congratulations to repeat WPIAL 3A champs Central Valley on another dominant win yesterday to continue a dominant season. Excited to see you guys keep it going. #PA17

What a game. Tough overtime loss for Aliquippa but so proud of how you played. Congrats to Coach Mike & and the team on an amazing season. I know how hard you worked & how hard this year has been.  Can't wait to be back in the Pit watching you guys play next year. #PA17

Proud to have helped line up cosponsors for this bill on both sides of the aisle & honored to represent Huck.   Please take a minute to read about Merrill's Marauders & what they did to earn the Congressional Gold Medal: https://t.co/YeBnT4UwCp

Thank you to everyone who has served & sacrificed for our country. It’s an honor to continue serving you on the House Veterans’ Affairs Committee to make sure you get the health care support & opportunities you’ve earned. #VeteransDay2020
Thank you @StopBigMoney. You've been with us from the start. https://t.co/kVf1AxzHzG
Thinking of my brothers and sisters in Afghanistan and "every clime and place where we could take a gun."  Happy Birthday Marines.

Biden campaign were great partners asking for & listening to our input every step of the way.  Starting with: who could help manage politics & grassroots coalition building in western PA. @AmyDorra1 who did that for us in 2 tough elections in 2018.   Congrats & thank you Amy. https://t.co/p7mT9WZ8fu
8-0. #HereWeGo
Told you organized labor had something to say. Thank you @AlleghenyLabor. #UnionStrong https://t.co/CBFdsf368d

Thank you to the people of #PA17 for putting your trust in me to continue serving you in Congress.  Thank you to everyone who voted & made this election possible under such difficult circumstances.  We did it. You did it. https://t.co/omHmxj3zH6
Congratulations to President-elect @JoeBiden. You won the battle for the soul of the nation. https://t.co/ADMZpYqEZe
We’ll be going LIVE on Facebook soon. Tune in. #PA17 https://t.co/yfopHIXO4f
It’s clear that there won’t be enough votes reported tonight to make a call in #PA17. But I feel great about what we’re seeing & look forward to every vote being counted.  Get some sleep.

The polls are closed in PA.  Thank you all so much for your hard work. Thank you for voting.  Now take a breath. Be proud of the work you've done. Know that we did everything we could. And we will make sure every vote is counted. #PA17
10 minutes. If you are in line before 8:00 STAY IN LINE. #VOTE   Let’s finish this. #PA17
The final hour. Stay in line. Cast your vote. Deliver your mail ballot.  This is it. Let’s win. #VOTE #PA17

Less than 2 hours to go.   Get to your poll before 8:00 & STAY until you #VOTE.  If you have a mail ballot deliver it to the County elections office BEFORE 8:00.  If you have any problems CALL US: (412) 403-1299.  Let’s win this. #PA17

Again not a widespread problem. But we’ve had a few reports & we want everyone to be able to vote & every to count.  If it happens to you call us & STAY at the polling place. The County will get you a form. https://t.co/xtz89ME3AK

IMPORTANT for people who got a mail ballot but decided to vote in person: If your polling place is out of declaration forms to surrender/spoil your mail ballot CALL US at (412) 403-1299.  Don't panic. This is a small entirely solvable problem. We got this. #PA17
Just over 5 hours to go. #VOTE #PA17
Volunteers bringing Fiori's for the troops at @AlleghenyLabor. A lot of food for a LOT of union members working hard to #GOTV. #PA17 https://t.co/WbXiKTjUBm

If you experience ANY problems at the polls today call our voter protection hotline: (412) 403-1299. #ElectionDay2020 #PA17
It's time. Let's go get it. #VOTE

We lost Nana 2 months ago & will miss her tomorrow.   Back in 2018 I asked if she & my grandfather used to go to mass on Election Day morning. She said no.  "Pop always said this isn't something you pray for. It's something you work for."  We're doing the work. Now let's win. https://t.co/ci25ZTuQuZ
Thank you @JoeBiden. We're going to win this together in #PA17 & all over PA. https://t.co/pzRhIwn1Kn

Just over 100 hours until polls close in PA.   If you have a mail in ballot complete it & return it IN PERSON to your County Election Office.  Or make a plan TODAY to #VOTE in person on TUESDAY.  Don't let anything stop you from voting. Let's win this. #PA17

Praying for the victims' families & friends & for the entire Jewish community of Pittsburgh. #StrongerThanHate

2 years ago was an awful sad scary day that we'll never forget. But with each year I hope we'll also remember the people we lost & the good lives they lived. The bravery we saw from the police who ran toward the gunshots. And the love & solidarity we felt in our community.
#VOTE.

Today would be a good day to #VOTE or make a plan to #VOTE in person on TUESDAY NOVEMBER 3RD.  Tomorrow would also be good. Wednesday works. Thursday also an option.   Really any day between today and TUESDAY NOVEMBER 3RD.  Just #VOTE. Don't let anyone stop you. #PA17

Appreciate this support from the @USChamber.  Infrastructure is a great example of something that brings labor & business together just as we have in this campaign.  Needs to be our top priority next year. #PA17 @NeilBradleyDC https://t.co/h7siZHJ1Sh

It's Election Day in PA. Two weeks from today (NOVEMBER 3rd) is the Last Election Day this year.   Every day in between is also Election Day.   #VOTE. By mail or in person. Just VOTE. Don't let anything stop you. #PA17

🚨New SECRET poll🚨 shows that most of you who want to #VOTE in person haven't made a plan. That's bad. Plans are good.  Where do you vote? When? How long's it take to get there? What if it's raining? Etc.  Make a plan. Make like 10 plans. Don't let ANYTHING stop you from voting.

It's Election Day in PA. It's also VOTER REGISTRATION DEADLINE DAY.   If you aren't registered you can't vote.  Make sure you're registered: https://t.co/IHc1qyh7jT  If you aren't what are you waiting for? REGISTER! https://t.co/CQD3AVG7Fp

The admin you support does use "always" to mean "maybe." Remember when POTUS said he'd "always" protect Social Security & Medicare? Now he's draining SS funding & overturning the ACA which would cut Medicare & raise costs for seniors.  "Always" is worth nothing to these people.

Well not "ALWAYS" since that would include right now when people are protected and you & the admin are trying to overturn that protection.  After overturning the law: You. Have. No. Plan.  You had it right on Saturday: You don't know how to answer this question. #PA17 https://t.co/VSWtRNWlCx

Asked if Republicans & the Trump admin should continue their legal efforts to overturn the ACA during the pandemic  [@SeanParnellUSA said]: 'I don’t know how to answer that & I don’t think they are.'”  We do agree on one thing: he has no idea how to answer this question. #PA17 https://t.co/AnQZLo2d4O,2020-09-27 23:51:02,Twitter Web App,68,205

DOJ lawyers will argue in Nov. that the ACA should be overturned including protections for preexisting conditions.  Last night @SeanParnellUSA admitted he agrees & is unprepared to talk about it. Because neither he nor the President have any plan to deal with the consequences.

Justice Ginsburg was selfless in a way we rarely see or deserve. She put herself through hell time & again to get back to work. Not for personal glory but for us. She put our whole country on her shoulders.  She earned all she got in this life & she earned a peaceful rest.

26 Republicans joined us today to halt changes at #USPS & ensure people get their medicine ballots & mail on time.  USPS is an institution that serves ALL Americans & helps bind us together.  We should have an even larger bipartisan majority committed to protecting it.

Lot of stories about how Biden sees & listens to everyone he meets. I've watched him.  Not everyone realizes this is why he knows we can unite the US. He sees the good in everyone knows the heart of our people & knows we all have something to give.  He's right: America's ready.

Western PA has supported #SocialSecurity since its creation. Westmoreland County's own Sen. Joe Guffey (17) was there 85 years ago as FDR signed it into law.  Also a good day to remember Frances Perkins (12) the Labor Secretary who made Social Security a reality. #SocSec85 https://t.co/pRDpAiGywt

85 yrs ago we made a promise: you pay into #SocialSecurity & your benefits are guaranteed by the gov't.  Now President Trump & his allies want to break that promise take from the fund & cut "entitlements" if reelected.  That's not how we treat promises in western PA. #SocSec85

President @realDonaldTrump:  No matter how many police officers you pose with no matter how many tweets you send or press conferences you hold people will always know:  When it really counted you were soft on crime.

Finally we need to remember what’s always been true: the public health solution & and the economic solution are the same.   Masks testing & tracing will get our kids back in school & people back at work.  In the real world rallies & press conferences don't actually help.

As businesses reopen & employees come back they NEED fast reliable testing & tracing — most of which happens at the state & local level.   They need kids back in school.  None of this works without funding for state & local governments.

But we can’t give up. Testing is not just about health but about jobs & schools.   A Nobel laureate says each additional test supports 9 jobs. Germany keeps its schools open with constant testing.   The President won’t do this so we have to support our governors.

OTOH we spent billions on testing & sacrificed trillions in economic activity but we’re going backward. Lack of a national strategy & commitment is to blame.   People in WPA still waiting 7 days for test results because we never got WWII-level leadership to fix the supply chain

Helped get money for @PITairport in the CARES Act & we’re working on securing more so construction can continue there.  Also hoping for good news on urgently needed locks & dams upgrades as we take up WRDA in the House.  So those are some positives.

We passed a major infrastructure bill that would bring millions of people back to work with Davis Bacon prevailing wage guarantee. An especially good investment with low interest rates & high unemployment.   Good for business & workers. Also for people who use roads & bridges.

The stimulus checks & additional $600 for unemployment helped. It’s not enough & we need bipartisan action to do more for longer. But it kept people alive & helped keep some money coming in to our local economy.
